select distinct s.SURVEY_name AS "surveyName", o.department_name AS "departmentName", i.EMPLOYEE_name AS "employeeName"
from survey_list s, project_history r, project_history a, organization_chart o, user_info i
where r.project_id = a.project_id and r.participation_employee_id <> a.participation_employee_id and s.survey_seq = 2310103 and i.grade_id = 2 and r.PROJECT_CLOSED_DATE <= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -(365 * 1),'YY/MM/dd') and i.employee_id = r.participation_employee_id and i.department_id = o.department_id
ORDER BY i.employee_name
